allow:
Bash(/tmp/verification-summary.txt << 'EOF'
=============================================================================
HumanSimulator Migration & Enhancement - COMPLETED
=============================================================================

✓ PHASE 1: File Creation
  - Created: /packages/worker-core/src/HumanSimulator.ts
  - Status: Enhanced version with 5 new methods

✓ PHASE 2: Export Configuration
  - Updated: /packages/worker-core/src/index.ts
  - Added exports: HumanSimulator, DEFAULT_HUMAN_SIMULATOR_CONFIG, 
                   HumanSimulatorConfig, ScrollDirection

✓ PHASE 3: Package Configuration
  - Updated: /packages/worker-core/package.json
  - Added export path: "./human-simulator"

✓ PHASE 4: Build Verification
  - Command: npm run build
  - Result: SUCCESS \(no errors\)
  - Generated: HumanSimulator.js, HumanSimulator.d.ts

=============================================================================
NEW FEATURES ADDED
=============================================================================

1. addCoordVariance\(x, y, variance?\)
   - Adds ±pixel variance to coordinates
   - Default: ±15px \(configurable\)
   - Prevents robotic exact-coordinate taps

2. randomDelay\(minMs, maxMs\)
   - Random delay between min and max
   - Replaces manual Math.random\(\) calculations

3. addNodeVariance\(baseDelay, nodeId\)
   - Node-specific consistent variance
   - Hash-based for distributed bot farms
   - Prevents synchronized patterns

4. typeWithDelay\(serial, text\)
   - Character-by-character typing
   - Variable 80ms±40% per character
   - Natural typing simulation

5. shouldPerform\(probability\)
   - Probability-based decisions
   - Replaces manual Math.random\(\) < prob checks

=============================================================================
CONFIGURATION ADDITIONS
=============================================================================

New config fields:
  coordVariancePx: 15        \(coordinate variance in pixels\)
  maxNodeVarianceMs: 3000    \(max node-based delay variance\)
  charDelayMs: 80            \(base character typing delay\)

Backward compatible: All existing youtube-bot code will work unchanged

=============================================================================
IMPORT PATTERNS
=============================================================================

Main package import \(recommended\):
  import { HumanSimulator } from '@doai/worker-core';

Subpath import \(alternative\):
  import { HumanSimulator } from '@doai/worker-core/human-simulator';

=============================================================================
VERIFICATION RESULTS
=============================================================================

✓ TypeScript compilation: PASSED
✓ Type definitions generated: YES
✓ All methods exported: YES
✓ Backward compatibility: MAINTAINED
✓ New features added: 5 methods + 3 config fields

=============================================================================
NEXT STEPS
=============================================================================

1. youtube-bot can now import from @doai/worker-core \(optional migration\)
2. Other bots \(health-bot, install-bot\) can use HumanSimulator
3. All bots share consistent human-like behavior patterns
4. Bot farm mode enabled via addNodeVariance\(\)

=============================================================================
EOF)
